InVision

Before I discovered the joys of MacBooks, I used to put together my own Windows builds because I am a huge dweeb.

A key component of any PC is its motherboard. This is like the central nevous system of a computer and therefore one of its most important parts. A trusted name in mid-level motherboards at the time was ASUS — a manufacturer from Taiwan. This is all I knew about Taiwan until I came across these watches.
